patthana1.17:1.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:2.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā,
patthana1.17:3.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.17:3.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:6.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:10.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ

patthana1.17:12.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:13.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:14.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:15.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:16.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:17.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:18.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.17:19.1_1: ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme
patthana1.17:19.1_2: āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.17:21.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:22.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:23.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:24.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.17:24.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:25.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetukādhipati.
patthana1.17:26.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:27.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke
patthana1.17:27.1_1: khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.
patthana1.17:28.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:28.1_1: Maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:30.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko adhipati.
patthana1.17:31.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ
patthana1.17:31.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:32.1_1: khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.

patthana1.17:37.1_1: ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.

patthana1.17:38.1_1: ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.

patthana1.17:47.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.17:48.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:49.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.17:50.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:51.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—maggārammaṇe
patthana1.17:51.1_1: khandhe paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipati ca cetanā.
patthana1.17:52.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetukā cetanā.
patthana1.17:53.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:54.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—maggahetuke
patthana1.17:54.1_1: khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca cetanā.
patthana1.17:55.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:56.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
patthana1.17:57.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
patthana1.17:58.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā. (Paripuṇṇaṁ.)
patthana1.17:59.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā— ahetukaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:60.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.17:65.1_3: jhāne sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṁ.
patthana1.17:68.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:69.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.17:70.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:71.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.17:72.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:73.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā
patthana1.17:74.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:75.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.17:76.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā
patthana1.17:77.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.17:77.1_2: maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa,
patthana1.17:78.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:79.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana1.17:79.1_1: paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:80.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:81.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:81.1_1: Sahajātādhipati—maggārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:82.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:82.1_1: Sahajātādhipati—maggārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:83.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:84.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:84.1_1: Ārammaṇādhipati—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:85.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.17:85.1_2: Ārammaṇādhipati—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:85.1_3: Sahajātādhipati—maggahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:86.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:86.1_1: Ārammaṇādhipati—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:87.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:87.1_1: Sahajātādhipati—maggahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggahetukānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:88.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.17:88.1_2: Ārammaṇādhipati—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:88.1_3: Sahajātādhipati—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:89.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.17:89.1_2: Ārammaṇādhipati—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:89.1_3: Sahajātādhipati—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.17:159.1_4: nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate
